schools.name: B J Hooper Elementary School
schools.school-summary: B J Hooper Elementary School, a public school located in Lindenhurst, IL, serves grades PK-6 in the Lake Villa Central Consolidated School District 41.It has received a GreatSchools Rating of 4 out of 10, based on a variety of school quality measures.
schools.district-name: Lake Villa Central Consolidated School District 41
schools.rating-description: The GreatSchools Rating helps parents compare schools within a state based on a variety of school quality indicators and provides a helpful picture of how effectively each school serves all of its students. Ratings are on a scale of 1 (below average) to 10 (above average) and can include test scores, college readiness, academic progress, advanced courses, equity, discipline and attendance data. We also advise parents to visit schools, consider other information on school performance and programs, and consider family needs as part of the school selection process.

schools.name: Millburn Middle School
schools.school-summary: Millburn Middle School, a public school located in Lindenhurst, IL, serves grades 6-8 in the Millburn Central Consolidated School District 24.It has received a GreatSchools Rating of 7 out of 10, based on a variety of school quality measures.
